Package student.model.Booking

Class CarBookingRepository

java.lang.Object
student.model.Booking.CarBookingRepository
public class CarBookingRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing CarBooking records in memory.

This class provides methods to add new bookings and mark existing bookings as canceled. All bookings are stored in a static list, which serves as an in-memory storage.

Note: Since a static list is used, this data is shared across the entire application lifetime and will be lost once the application stops.

    • getCarBookings

      public List<CarBooking> getCarBookings()

      Returns:
      a List of all current car bookings

    • book

      Adds a new CarBooking record to the repository.
      Parameters:
      carBooking - the booking to be stored

    • cancelCarBooking

      public void cancelCarBooking(UUID bookingId)
      Marks an existing booking as canceled, identified by its unique ID. If the booking cannot be found, throws an exception.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the unique identifier of the booking to cancel
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no booking with the given ID is found
